|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 06/02/2011 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |country = China
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== This device does not currently have a FCC ID under the B-LINK grantee code.
B-LINK photos show the device with what appears to be a completely bogus FCC ID (KSZ2009080303A) of which the grantee code has not been used since 1993.
The FCC ID of the [[Blupont WL-GI-600N|Blupont product]] using this model has been assigned to it.
==Pictures== <gallery mode="slideshow" caption="B-LINK's images"> File:BLINK BL-LW04-A2 1.jpg File:BLINK BL-LW04-A2 2.jpg File:BLINK BL-LW04-A2 3.jpg </gallery>[[Has images::retail| ]][[Has images::external| ]]
